body_html:
Sharing physical nodes across ps is usually a bad idea as ps is very network-heavy. PS also can use multiple cores (most tf code does) when updating variables.

The suggested file location is good.

I'll close this issue for now since it's old, but please reopen as a pull request if you want to contribute.

body:
Sharing physical nodes across ps is usually a bad idea as ps is very network-heavy. PS also can use multiple cores (most tf code does) when updating variables.

The suggested file location is good.

I'll close this issue for now since it's old, but please reopen as a pull request if you want to contribute.
